official_title: To establish within the Office of the Inspector General of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission a unit to be charged with auditing the safety analysis and review activities of the Commission and personnel of nuclear power plants licensed by the Commission.
short_title: Nuclear Power Plant Safety Enhancement Act

summary.text: Nuclear Power Plant Safety Enhancement Act - Amends the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to establish within the Office of the Inspector General of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) a unit to audit and review NRC safety analysis, activities, and personnel of NRC nuclear power plant licensees.Authorizes appropriations.
